message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it down the middle. Fair is fair.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
Let's be reasonable. I'm offering a fair split, but time is running out.  We need to come to an agreement soon.
Getting closer, let's make a deal
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to compromise, but we need to agree quickly before the value of the money decreases further.
